items.title: Supreme Court strikes down EPA rules on discharge of water pollution
items.description: The justices ruled that the agency cannot impose generic prohibitions against violating water quality standards.

items.title: Supreme Court seems likely to block Mexico’s lawsuit vs. U.S. gunmakers
